data.name: Capcom Arcade Stadium: Mini-Album Track 5 - Super Street Fighter II Turbo - Cammy's Theme
data.detailed_description:
The fifth track of the Capcom Arcade Stadium: Mini-Album, "Super Street Fighter II Turbo - Cammy's Theme" drills into Steam!

Cammy's iconic stage theme is a staple of Super Street Fighter II Turbo, one of the titles included in Capcom Arcade Stadium!

Don't miss out on some nostalgic favorites!
